entry.title: Axiom3D is moving to GitHub!
entry.content: You heard it here first, we are moving the project to GitHub from SourceForge and BitBucket. There is still a lot of work to be done, but it has started.
entry.summary: You heard it here first, we are moving the project to GitHub from SourceForge and BitBucket. There is still a lot of work to be done, but it has started.
